nodes.text: Trace was a Human male Smuggler, who was a friend of Han Solo, where he was seen in the cantina on Tansarii Point Station when the Millennium Falcon landed there for repairs.

Trace appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
